title: Change to energy by doubling dielectric

content.question: A parallel-plate capacitor with a dielectric material of constant <math alttext="kappa" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>κ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is fully charged by connecting to a battery of emf <math alttext="epsilon" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>ε</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. The energy stored in the capacitor is <math alttext="U" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>U</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.The capacitor is replaced by a capacitor that is identical except that its dielectric material has a constant of <math alttext="2 kappa" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mstyle><mrow><mi>κ</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>. The energy stored in the new capacitor is

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
